title: And there was much rejoicing
author: VD
content_html:
I’m posting this on Berzerker Prime, the massive new machine that is replacing the failing Mtech. It’s a ProStar, which means that it’s from essentially the same manufacturer, Clevo, but it seems as if all of the minor design flaws have been eradicated and replaced with a few useful idiosyncracies. It’s far too soon to pass judgment, of course, but the initial impressions are positive.

Now, to see if Total War: Rome actually works on this thing.
content_text:
I’m posting this on Berzerker Prime, the massive new machine that is replacing the failing Mtech.  It’s a ProStar, which means that it’s from essentially the same manufacturer, Clevo, but it seems as if all of the minor design flaws have been eradicated and replaced with a few useful idiosyncracies.  It’s far too soon to pass judgment, of course, but the initial impressions are positive.
Now, to see if Total War: Rome actually works on this thing.
